name: Queen Cleopatra's StackMatch
description:
An addictive casual puzzle matching game has come to challenge you!

Help the Queen Cleopatra to collect hieroglyphic tiles for building her pyramid by touching on pairs of matching free tiles on the stacks.

In the Time Trial mode you must do this as quickly as possible. Be careful! each layout you select have different timer level that will tick down.

Use strategy when matching the tiles on the stacks to solve the puzzles and win!

Features:
- Music library access directly from the game to play your favourite tracks during game play.
- Addictive game play.
- Play Normal and Time Trial modes.
- Attraction mode will show you attractive playing tutorials.
- Four different stack layouts in each mode.
- Unlimited challenges.
- Global and local high scores.
- Support Game Center.
- Stunning graphics.
- High quality music and sound effects, very good for you that love listening music using earphone ( headphone or headset or earbud or stereophone ).
- Universal design for iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch.
- Supports iPod library access to play your favorite tracks during game play.
- Supports fast app switching on multitasking devices.
